spell_tooltip.description:
Heals a friendly target for an amount equal to 100% your maximum health.

Cannot be used on a target with Forbearance. Causes Forbearance for 30 sec.

Learn Concentration Aura, Devotion Aura, and Crusader Aura:

Concentration Aura:
Interrupt and Silence effects on party and raid members within 40 yds are 30% shorter. 

 Devotion Aura:
Party and raid members within 40 yds are bolstered by their devotion, reducing damage taken by 3%.

 Crusader Aura:
Increases mounted speed by 20% for all party and raid members within 40 yds.

Hurls a divine hammer that strikes an enemy for 287,588 Holystrike damage. Only usable on enemies that have less than 20% health, or during Avenging Wrath.

Generates 1 Holy Power.
Cleanses a friendly target, removing all Poison and Disease effects.
Emits dazzling light in all directions, blinding enemies within 10 yds, causing them to wander disoriented for 6 sec. Damage may cancel the effect.

The cooldown of Lay on Hands is reduced up to 60%, based on the target's missing health.

Word of Glory's healing is increased by up to 100% on yourself, based on your missing health.
Leap atop your Charger for 8 sec, increasing movement speed by 100%. Usable while indoors or in combat.

Judgment causes the target to take 20% increased damage from your next Holy Power ability.

Multiple applications may overlap.
Divine Steed now has 2 charges.
Blesses a party or raid member, granting immunity to movement impairing effects for 8 sec.
Interrupts spellcasting and prevents any spell in that school from being cast for 3 sec.
Speed increased by 2% and damage taken from area of effect attacks reduced by 2%.

Instantly cast Judgment on up to 5 targets within 30 yds.

Divine Toll's Judgment deals 100% increased damage.
Blessing of Freedom increases movement speed by 30%, and you gain Blessing of Freedom when cast on a friendly target.
Armor increased by 40%, Stamina increased by 20% and damage taken from area of effect attacks reduced by 12%.

Blesses a party or raid member, reducing their damage taken by 30%, but you suffer 100% of damage prevented.

Last 12 sec, or until transferred damage would cause you to fall below 20% health.
After casting Divine Toll, you instantly cast Judgment every 5 sec for 15 sec.

Blesses a party or raid member, granting immunity to Physical damage and harmful effects for 10 sec.

Cannot be used on a target with Forbearance. Causes Forbearance for 30 sec.

Your Consecration is 15% larger, and enemies within it have 50% reduced movement speed.

Your Divine Hammer is 25% larger, and enemies within them have 30% reduced movement speed.
Armor and critical strike chance increased by 4%.
Reduces the cooldown of Blessing of Sacrifice by 60 sec.
Holy Power spending abilities have a 10% chance to make your next Holy Power spending ability free and deal 10% increased damage and healing.
Reduces the cooldown of your Divine Shield, Shield of Vengeance, Divine Protection, and Lay on Hands by 30%.
Divine Storm heals you and up to 2 nearby allies for 1.0% of maximum health.
Blessing of Sacrifice now removes and prevents all Poison and Disease effects.
Allies are healed for 105,353 when you cast a Blessing spell on them and healed again for 107,665 when the blessing ends.
Mastery increased by 4% and strength increased by 4%.
Hammer of Wrath deals 60% increased damage to enemies below 35% health.

When you cast 3 Holy Power generating abilities, you gain Blessing of Dawn. When you consume Blessing of Dawn, you gain Blessing of Dusk.

Blessing of Dawn
Your next Holy Power spending ability deals 20% additional increased damage and healing. This effect stacks.

Blessing of Dusk
Damage taken reduced by 4% For 10 sec.
10% of all healing done to you from other sources heals up to 4 nearby allies, divided evenly among them.

Removing harmful effects with Divine Shield heals you for 10% for each effect removed.  This heal cannot exceed 30% of your maximum health.

Divine Shield may now be cast while Forbearance is active.

Pierce an enemy with a blade of light, dealing 522,848 Holy damage.

Generates 2 Holy Power.

Unleashes a whirl of divine energy, dealing 271,972 Radiant damage to all nearby enemies. 

Deals reduced damage beyond 5 targets.
Reduces the cooldown of Judgment by 2 sec and Crusader Strike by 2 sec.
Your Blade of Justice causes the target to burn for 179,910 Radiant damage over 9 sec.
Blade of Justice generates 1 additional Holy Power.

Unleashes a powerful weapon strike that deals 473,257 Holystrike damage to an enemy target,

Final Verdict has a 15% chance to reset the cooldown of Hammer of Wrath and make it usable on any target, regardless of their health.

When your health is brought below 25%, you instantly cast a free Word of Glory at 60% effectiveness on yourself.

Cannot occur more than once every 60 sec.

Your auto attacks have a 20% chance to reset the cooldown of Blade of Justice.

Critical strikes increase the chance by an additional 10%.

Final Verdict and Blade of Justice deal 10% increased damage.

The range of Final Verdict and Blade of Justice is increased to 20 yds.
Divine Storm projects an additional wave of light, striking all enemies up to 20 yds in front of you for 20% of Divine Storm's damage.

Call upon the Light and begin a crusade, increasing your haste and damage by 3% for 27 sec.

Each Holy Power spent during Crusade increases haste and damage by an additional 3%.

Maximum 10 stacks.

Hammer of Wrath may be cast on any target.
Auto-attack speed increased by 40%.
Judgment generates 1 additional Holy Power and has a 50% increased chance to trigger Mastery: Highlord's Judgment.

Crusader Strike replaces your auto-attacks and deals 85,831 Holystrike damage, but now only generates 1 Holy Power every 2 attacks.

Inherits Crusader Strike benefits but cannot benefit from Skyfury.

Divine Hammers spin around you, striking enemies nearby for 83,177 Radiant damage every 2 sec for 8 sec.

While active, each Holy Power spent increases the duration of Divine Hammer by 0.5 sec. Deals reduced damage beyond 8 targets.

Divine Storm deals 10% increased damage and when it hits an enemy affected by your Expurgation, it spreads the effect to up to 4 targets hit.

You deal 3% increased Holy damage to targets burning from your Expurgation.
Mastery: Highlord's Judgment is 50% more effective on Judgment and Hammer of Wrath. Judgment applies an additional stack of Greater Judgment if it is known.

Lash out at your enemies, dealing 603,391 Radiant damage to all enemies within 14 yds in front of you, and applying Truth's Wake, burning the targets for an additional 368,194 damage over 9 sec.

Demon and Undead enemies are also stunned for 5 sec.

Generates 3 Holy Power.
Crusader Strike and Judgment hit an additional 4 targets but deal 25% reduced damage to secondary targets.
Crusading Strikes has a 5% chance to make your next Divine Storm free and deal 15% additional damage.
Critical Strike damage of your abilities increased by 5% and Hammer of Wrath also has a chance to cast Highlord's Judgment.

Creates a barrier of holy light that absorbs 3.2 million damage for 10 sec.

When the shield expires, it bursts to inflict Holy damage equal to the total amount absorbed, divided among all nearby enemies.
Your damage over time effects deal 10% more damage.
Crusading Strikes, Judgment, Hammer of Wrath and your damaging single target Holy Power abilities now deal Holystrike damage and your abilities that deal Holystrike damage deal 5% increased damage.

Call down a blast of heavenly energy, dealing 982,789 Holy damage to all targets in the area and causing them to take 30% increased damage from your single target Holy Power abilities, and 15% increased damage from other Holy Power abilities for 12 sec.
Wake of Ashes deals significantly reduced damage to secondary targets, but now causes you to lash out 2 extra times for 386,605 Radiant damage.
Divine Storm, Divine Hammer and Consecration now deal Radiant damage and your abilities that deal Radiant damage deal 5% increased damage.

Avenging Wrath is replaced with Radiant Glory.

Radiant Glory
Wake of Ashes activates Avenging Wrath for 8 sec.

Each Holy Power spent has a chance to activate Avenging Wrath for 4 sec.

When Truth's Wake critically strikes, its duration is extended by 2 sec.

Your other damage over time effects deal 30% increased damage to targets affected by Truth's Wake.

Wake of Ashes is replaced with Hammer of Light for 20 sec after it is cast.

 Hammer of Light:
Hammer down your enemy with the power of the Light, dealing 1.4 million Holy damage and 979,194 Holy damage up to 4 nearby enemies. 

Additionally, calls down Empyrean Hammers from the sky to strike 3 nearby enemies for 69,128 Holy damage each.

Costs 5 Holy Power.
Hammer of Light instantly calls down 2 Empyrean Hammers on your target when it is cast.
After casting Hammer of Light, you call down an Empyrean Hammer on a nearby target every 2 sec, for 10 sec.

When Empyrean Hammer critically strikes, 125% of its damage is dealt to nearby enemies.

Enemies hit by this effect deal 5% reduced damage to you for 8 sec.

Wake of Ashes surrounds you with a Holy barrier for 10% of your maximum health.

Hammer of Light heals you for 5% of your maximum health, increased by 1% for each additional target hit. Any overhealing done with this effect gets converted into a Holy barrier instead.
Crusader Strike, Hammer of Wrath and Blade of Justice extend the duration of Shake the Heavens by 1 sec.
Divine Steed lasts 2 sec longer and increases your movement speed by an additional 30% for the first 3 sec.

Casting Judgment increases the damage of Empyrean Hammer by 10% for 12 sec.

Multiple applications may overlap.

Templar's Verdict, Divine Storm and Divine Hammer calls down an Empyrean Hammer on a nearby enemy.

While Shake the Heavens is active, this effect calls down an additional Empyrean Hammer.
Hammer of Light applies Judgment to its targets, and increases your Haste by 15% for 8 sec.

You gain a stack of Light's Deliverance when you call down an Empyrean Hammer.

While Wake of Ashes and Hammer of Light are unavailable, you consume 50 stacks of Light's Deliverance, empowering yourself to cast Hammer of Light an additional time for free.
